location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from L Darling, to Her British Majesty's Consul at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, L Darling writes to the British Consul at Bushire to obtain commercial information regarding the market of Bushire in relation to imports and exports. Darlingâ€™s questions cover the following subjects: duties levied upon imports; the articles that are usually imported and exported; the fluctuation in prices; the weights and measures used; the currency used and port charges.
